problem_statement: You are tasked with building a Customer Support Ticketing System for a mid-size company to manage customer inquiries, track issue resolution, and measure support performance. The previous system led to lost tickets, delayed responses, and poor reporting. Your goal is to create a Node.js backend API that allows customers to submit tickets, agents to manage them, and the company to track SLA compliance, agent performance, and ticket statusâ€”all while preventing lost or unresolved tickets.
